definition: drawing a figure satisfying certain conditions as part of solving a problem or proving a theorem
details:
noun
- drawing a figure satisfying certain conditions as part of solving a problem or proving a theorem
= example: drawing a figure satisfying certain conditions as part of solving a problem or proving a theorem
- the act of constructing something
= example: the act of constructing something
= synonyms: building
- the commercial activity involved in repairing old structures or constructing new ones
= example: the commercial activity involved in repairing old structures or constructing new ones
= synonyms: building
- a thing constructed
= synonyms: structure
- the creation of a construct
= synonyms: mental synthesis
- a group of words that form a constituent of a sentence and are considered as a single unit
= example: a group of words that form a constituent of a sentence and are considered as a single unit
= synonyms: expression, grammatical construction
- an interpretation of a text or action
= example: an interpretation of a text or action
= synonyms: twist
